MAN.TITLE: unix_g
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: shell (sh) command execution, output redirected to a variable

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a column vector of character strings

DESCRIPTION.P: Sends a string cmd to Unix for execution by the sh shell. The standard output is redirected to scilab variable rep. Unix execution errors are trapped; *NOTE* that only the last shell command error is reported when a list of command separated by ";" is sent: this is not recommended.
